publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1054 Mrs Nanette Milne: Congratulations to "Young Live and Loud in Aberdeenshire"-That the Parliament congratulates the young people and youth workers who organised the "Young Live and Loud in Aberdeenshire" event, on running a very successful and enjoyable day on Saturday 13 March 2004; notes that the entire Thainstone Mart complex was given over to the event which raised the awareness of over 2000 young people of the activities and leisure opportunities available to them in the Aberdeenshire region; hopes that the organisers will be able to build upon their successes by turning it into an annual event, and further hopes that other regions will follow the example set by Aberdeenshire in promoting activities to engage with young people and increase their participation in physical leisure and community opportunities.

S2M-1054 Congratulations to "Young Live and Loud in Aberdeenshire" (lodged on 17 March 2004) Alex Johnstone*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Murdo Fraser*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Richard Lochhead*, Nora Radcliffe*, Shiona Baird*, Tommy Sheridan*

S2M-1054 Mrs Nanette Milne: Congratulations to "Young Live and Loud in Aberdeenshire"-That the Parliament congratulates the young people and youth workers who organised the "Young Live and Loud in Aberdeenshire" event, on running a very successful and enjoyable day on Saturday 13 March 2004; notes that the entire Thainstone Mart complex was given over to the event which raised the awareness of over 2000 young people of the activities and leisure opportunities available to them in the Aberdeenshire region; hopes that the organisers will be able to build upon their successes by turning it into an annual event, and further hopes that other regions will follow the example set by Aberdeenshire in promoting activities to engage with young people and increase their participation in physical leisure and community opportunities. Supported by: Alex Johnstone, Mr David Davidson, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Murdo Fraser, Mr Jamie Stone, Richard Lochhead, Nora Radcliffe, Shiona Baird, Tommy Sheridan, Robin Harper*
S2M-1054 Congratulations to "Young Live and Loud in Aberdeenshire" (lodged on 17 March 2004) Dr Jean Turner*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1054 Congratulations to "Young Live and Loud in Aberdeenshire" (lodged on 17 March 2004) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-1054 Congratulations to "Young Live and Loud in Aberdeenshire" (lodged on 17 March 2004) Bill Aitken*
S2M-1054 Congratulations to "Young Live and Loud in Aberdeenshire" (lodged on 17 March 2004) John Scott*
